title: xo (only if you say yes)
Lyrics:
[엔하이픈 "XO (Only If You Say Yes)" 가사]

[Intro]
X-O
X-O
Kiss me
Don't say no

[Chorus: Sunghoon, NI-KI]
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
Kiss me, e-e-e-e-e
Don't say no, o-o-o-o-o
X-O, yeah

[Verse 1: Heeseung, Sunoo]
오직 너만 줄 수 있는 허락의 말
해도 달도 따다 줄 수 있어 말해
허락의 그 말
너의 X-O
나의 구원
Please babe, say yes

[Pre-Chorus: Jay, Jake, Heeseung, Jungwon]
황혼이 내릴 때
네 모든 꿈을 이루어줄게
Please say my name
나 너의 지니가 되어줄게
So just say, oh, babe
날 움직이는 단 하나 열쇠, yeah
나를 사용해
내 우주의 유일한 신 그대

[Chorus: NI-KI, Sunoo, Jay]
X-O
X-O
Kiss me
Don't say no
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
Kiss me, e-e-e-e-e
Don't say no, o-o-o-o-o
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
Kiss me, e-e-e-e-e
Just say, oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
X-O, yeah

[Verse 2: Sunghoon, Jake, Heeseung]
Can I kiss you? Can I hug you?
너에게 감사해, yeah
Would you kiss me? Would you hug me?
허락을 구할게, yeah
One and (One and) only (Only)
나의 (나의) 여신 (여신)
For you (For you) I will

[Pre-Chorus: Jake, Sunoo, Jungwon, NI-KI, *Heeseung*, **Jay**]
So just say, oh, babe
저 달을 향해 날아가 볼래?
So just say, oh, babe
더 멋진 차와 집이 필요해?
*So just say, oh, babe
날 움직이는 단 하나 열쇠, yeah*
**나를 사용해
네 모든 꿈이 이루어지게, yeah, yеah, yeah**

[Chorus: Jungwon, Heeseung, Jake]
X-O
X-O
Kiss me
Don't say no
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
Kiss me, е-e-e-e-e
Don't say no, o-o-o-o-o
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
X-O, O-O-O-O-O
Kiss me, e-e-e-e-e
Just say, oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

title: sweet venom
Lyrics:
[엔하이픈 "Sweet Venom" 가사]

[Intro: Sunghoon]
Yeah
Oh-oh

[Verse 1: Jay, Jake]
Hey, 내 안에 번져가는 something
감미롭게 나를 이끄네
달콤한 poison in my blood veins
날 구원해 주네, now I'm

[Pre-Chorus: Heeseung]
Dying in your arms
Feeling like on a cloud
혈관 속에 퍼져가는
Taste of your

[Chorus: NI-KI, Sunoo, Jungwon]
Sweet-ee-eet venom-nom-nom
Yeah, all I need-ee-eed is your poison (Is your poison)
데려가 새로운 세계로
So alive, 필멸을 내게로
Sweet-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)

[Post-Chorus: Sunghoon, Jungwon]
Sweet-ee-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)
Sweet-ee-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)

[Verse 2: Heeseung, Sunoo]
Woah, 차가운 손길로 널 찾고
입술은 여전히 널 불러
기꺼이 널 위해 날 바쳐, 날 바쳐
내 삶을 거둬줘, now I'm

[Pre-Chorus: Jay]
Dying in your arms (Ooh)
Feeling like on a cloud (Cloud)
혈관 속에 퍼져가는
Taste of your (혈관 속에 퍼져가)

[Chorus: Jungwon, Jake, NI-KI]
Sweet-ee-eet venom-nom-nom
Yeah, all I need-ee-eed is your poison (Is your poison)
데려가 새로운 세계로
So alive, 필멸을 내게로
Sweet-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)

[Post-Chorus: NI-KI, Jungwon]
Sweet venom (Ooh)
Sweet venom (Oh)

[Bridge: Sunghoon, Heeseung]
영원 따윈 포기할게 right now
지금 내겐 오직 taste of your

[Chorus: NI-KI, Heeseung, Jay]
Sweet-ee-eet venom-nom-nom
Yeah, all I need-ee-eed is your poison (All I need is your poison)
데려가 새로운 세계로
So alive, 필멸을 내게로
Sweet-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)

[Post-Chorus: Sunoo, Jay]
Sweet-ee-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)
Sweet-ee-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Sweet venom)

[Outro: Jake]
Sweet-ee-ee-eet, ee-ee-ee-eet (Venom)

title: bite me
Lyrics:
[엔하이픈 "Bite Me" 가사]

[Intro: Sunoo, Heeseung]
It's you and me in this world
내게로 다시 와, tie me
날 구원할 거라면
Just come kiss me and bite me (Oh, babe)

[Verse 1: Jungwon, Sunghoon, Jake, NI-KI]
혈관 속 memory
널 찾던 내 세포는 scream
이젠 알아, what I had to be
운명은 우릴 다시 발견했지
Got me bad, bad, bad, 나를 괴롭힌
뭔갈 찾아 헤매는 dreams
떠올랐어, when you next to me
잠시 잊혀진 나의 이름이

[Refrain: Jay, Sunoo]
(Oh, my, oh, my God)
This blood's pumpin' crazy
(Oh, my, oh, my God)
'Cause I know you'll save me

[Pre-Chorus: NI-KI, Sunghoon, Jay, Jake]
Come here and get some (Some)
남겨줘 on my neck
네 거란 증거 (거)
Just come over and bite me
Come here and get some (Some)
널 찬미할 sidekick
그게 내 숙명 (명)
Just come over and bite me

[Chorus: Jungwon, Heeseung]
It's you and me in this world
내게로 다시 와, tie me
날 구원할 거라면
Just come kiss me and bite me (Oh, babe)
It's you and me in this world
이 어둠 속에서 light me (Woo-ooh)
기회를 줄 거라면
Just come kiss me and bite me, yeah-eh-eh

[Verse 2: NI-KI, Sunghoon, Heeseung]
너에게 바칠게
너를 지킬 brave heart
과거에 버린 내
어리석은 오만
Come to me, make it right
다시 연결해 줘, 날
삼켜, 날
Yeah-eh

[Refrain: Sunoo, Jay]
(Oh, my, oh, my God)
This blood's pumpin' crazy
(Oh, my, oh, my God)
'Cause I know you'll save me

[Pre-Chorus: Sunghoon, NI-KI, Jay, Jungwon]
Come here and get some (Some)
남겨줘 on my neck
네 거란 증거 (거)
Just come over and bite me
Come here and get some (Some)
널 찬미할 sidekick
그게 내 숙명 (명)
Just come over and bite me

[Chorus: Jake, Heeseung]
It's you and me in this world
내게로 다시 와, tie me
날 구원할 거라면
Just come kiss me and bite me (Oh, babe)
It's you and me in this world
이 어둠 속에서 light me (Woo-ooh)
기회를 줄 거라면
Just come kiss me and bite me, yeah-eh-eh
